Qualification: Bachelor of Science in Ag- riculture (Agricultural Eco- nomics)
Description: NSC 26 + Achievement level 4 in Mathematics, Physical Sciences and English as well as in either Life Sciences or Agricultural Sciences

Qualification: Bachelor of Science in Agri- culture (Agribusiness Man- agement)
Description: NSC 26 as certified by the Council for General and Further Education and Training (Umalusi) with an achievement rating of 4 (adequate achievement, 50- 59%) or better in each of the following four recognised 20-credit NSC subjects: En- glish, Mathematics, Physical Science and Life Sciences.

Qualification: Bachelor of Science in Agri- culture (Animal Science)
Description: NSC 26 as certified by the Council for General and Further Education and Training (Umalusi) with an achievement rating of 4 (adequate achievement, 50- 59%) or better in each of the following four recognised 20-credit NSC subjects: En- glish, Mathematics, Physical Science and Life Sciences.

Qualification: Bachelor of Science in Ag- riculture (Horticultural Sci- ences)
Description: NSC 26 as certified by the Council for General and Further Education and Training (Umalusi) with an achievement rating of 4 (adequate achievement, 50- 59%) or better in each of the following four recognised 20-credit NSC subjects: En- glish, Mathematics, Physical Science and Life Sciences.
